item.title: By: Gigi Garnett
item.dc:creator: Gigi Garnett
item.description: Lewis, I am riveted by your trip. It is going to be required reading for all Garnetts. You are writing clearly and beautifully and I get some of this for the first time! Thank you and keep it up Love Gigi
item.content:encoded:
Lewis,
I am riveted by your trip. It is going to be required reading for all Garnetts. You are writing clearly and beautifully and I get some of this for the first time! Thank you and keep it up Love Gigi
